item.title: Prereqs
item.description: To get ready to use Pixie to debug an application on a Kubernetes cluster, we will: Add a node group to scale the EKS cluster. Deploy a demo microservices app. Visit the microservices app front-end and trigger a bug. Add a node group To accommodate the pods deployed by Pixie and the microservices demo application, we will add a managed node group to scale the eksworkshop-eksctl cluster.
